varselforgroenland.name: Warning for Greenlandic seaareas
varselforgroenland.text:
There is gale warning for Kiatak.
Warning number. 735 is still valid.

gyldighed.name: Validhoures
gyldighed.text: Forecast, valid to Thursday d. 6. August, 06 UTC..

oversigt.name: Synoptic situation
oversigt.text: A low, 1000 hPa, west of Ellesmere Island, is moving towards northeast, and an associated front is moving towards northwestern Greenland from west and northwest. A high, 1025 hPa, over Davis Strait, is almost stationary. A low, 990 hPa, near Faroe Islands, is moving towards north.

udsigtfordaneborg.name: Forecast for Daneborg
udsigtfordaneborg.text: Around north, or variable, below 8 m/s. Good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

wavesdaneborg.name: Waves Daneborg
wavesdaneborg.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtforkangikajik.name: Forecast for Kangikajik
udsigtforkangikajik.text: North and northeast, 3 to 10 m/s, this night increasing to, 5 to 13 m/s, strongest in southeastern part. Good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

waveskangikajik.name: Waves Kangikajik
waveskangikajik.text: Significant wave height: 2,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtforaputiteeq.name: Forecast for Aputiteeq
udsigtforaputiteeq.text: North and northeast, 3 to 8 m/s, in eastern part locally up to 10 m/s. Good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

wavesaputiteeq.name: Waves Aputiteeq
wavesaputiteeq.text: Significant wave height: 2,5 m. Swells: 2 m.

udsigtforkulusuk.name: Forecast for Kulusuk
udsigtforkulusuk.text: Variable, below 8 m/s. Good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

waveskulusuk.name: Waves Kulusuk
waveskulusuk.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 2 m.

udsigtfortimmiarmiut.name: Forecast for Timmiarmiut
udsigtfortimmiarmiut.text: Variable, below 8 m/s. Good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

wavestimmiarmiut.name: Waves Timmiarmiut
wavestimmiarmiut.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 2 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kangia
udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.text: Around west, 5 to 10 m/s. Mainly good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

waveskangia.name: Waves Nunap Isuata Kangia
waveskangia.text: Significant wave height: 2,5 m. Swells: 2 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kitaa
udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.text: Around northwest, 5 to 10 m/s, locally 13 m/s, this night gradually variable, below 8 m/s. Good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

waveskitaa.name: Waves Isuata Kitaa
waveskitaa.text: Significant wave height: 2,5 m. Swells: 2 m.

udsigtfornunarsuit.name: Forecast for Nunarsuit
udsigtfornunarsuit.text: Around northwest, 8 to 13 m/s, from this evening decreasing, and gradually variable, below 8 m/s. Good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

wavesnunarsuit.name: Waves Nunarsuit
wavesnunarsuit.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtfornarsalik.name: Forecast for Narsalik
udsigtfornarsalik.text: Mainly around northwest, 5 to 13 m/s, strongest in southeastern part, from this evening decreasing, and gradually variable, below 8 m/s. Good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

wavesnarsalik.name: Waves Narsalik
wavesnarsalik.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtformeqquitsoq.name: Forecast for Meqquitsoq
udsigtformeqquitsoq.text: North and northwest, 3 to 8 m/s. Mainly good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

wavesmeqquitsoq.name: Waves Meqquitsoq
wavesmeqquitsoq.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtforattu.name: Forecast for Attu
udsigtforattu.text: Mainly north and northwest, or variable, below 8 m/s. Mainly good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

wavesattu.name: Waves Attu
wavesattu.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtforuiffaq.name: Forecast for Uiffaq
udsigtforuiffaq.text: Variable, below 8 m/s. Mainly good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

wavesuiffaq.name: Waves Uiffaq
wavesuiffaq.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.name: Forecast for Qimusseriarsuaq
udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.text: In northwestern and western part around south, 8 to 13 m/s, and rain with moderate visibility. Otherwise variable, later south, 3 to 8 m/s, and good visibility, however with risk of fog patches.

wavesqimusseriarsuaq.name: Waves Qimusseriarsuaq
wavesqimusseriarsuaq.text: Significant wave height: 2,5 m. Swells: 2,0 m.

udsigtforkiatak.name: Forecast for Kiatak

waveskiatak.name: Waves Kiatak
waveskiatak.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 2 m.
